name: Figma Website Mockup (free) #OzoneLayer
description:
It's our Weekly Design Challenge. It was inspired by the #WorldOzoneDay, Preservation of Ozone Layer International Day celebrated on September 16th.


To follow the concept, we created a design that promotes interaction between people from all over the world, members of ONUâ€™s executive board, and special guests.


Our goal is to broaden the discussion of how to protect the ozone layer using online meetings as the main communication tool.


Time-lapse tutorial

https://youtu.be/mSjEZnyAD5A


Follow us at @strides.digital for more challenges.
